column1: '''''Parma Eldalamberon''''' '''10''' is the tenth issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]''.
* [[Patrick Wynne]]: Front cover: "The Death of Glorfindel"
* [[Taum Santoski]]: "A Glossary of the Minor Languages in The Etymologies"
* Leonid Korablev: Art, "The Ring of Barahir"
* Lisa Star: "Introduction to the Ilkorin Dialects"
* [[Patrick Wynne]]: "The Quenya Case System in the Later Writings of J.R.R.Tolkien"
* [[Tom Loback]]: Back cover: "Nuin, Father of Speech"
